name: Pathmatic
description:
Pathmatic is a creative, colourful and confounding puzzle game for Android. Your job is simple. Help guide Professor Matthew Matic from one side of the board to the other... but think before you move! Every step you take affects your score. Find the path to the goal that generates the correct score, or face the gut-wrenching disapproval of the Professor.


  Whether you're looking for a challenge, wanting to sharpen your maths skills, or even just a bit of daily brain-training, with 100 original levels, this will be no walk in the lab. The Professor is counting on you! Think you have what it takes?


  Check the download links below to find out!
